about.title: What is The Freak Circus?
about.description: The Freak Circus is a psychological horror visual novel that takes you on a journey through the twisted minds of its characters. Set in a mysterious circus where nothing is as it seems, you'll encounter Pierrot and Harlequin - two enigmatic figures whose stories will challenge everything you think you know about reality. The Day 2 update plunges players into a darker narrative involving kidnapping, psychological manipulation, and the tragic legend of Columbina that reveals the deep-seated animosity between Pierrot and Harlequin. Explore new tent locations, meet mysterious characters like the Jester, Doctor, and Ticket Taker, and uncover hidden scenes that add depth to this twisted tale.
about.feature1Desc: Experience deep psychological themes that will keep you questioning reality
about.feature2Desc: Meet complex characters with intricate backstories and motivations
about.feature3Desc: Your decisions will shape the narrative and determine the outcome
about.feature4Desc: Dive into a carefully crafted world with stunning visuals and sound design

characters.title: Meet the Characters
characters.subtitle: Discover the enigmatic figures that inhabit The Freak Circus
characters.pierrotDesc: The melancholic clown who hides deep emotions behind a painted smile. His story is one of love, loss, and the price of keeping secrets.
characters.harlequinDesc: The mischievous trickster whose playful exterior masks a complex personality. Her relationship with Pierrot forms the heart of the story.
characters.jesterDesc: The storyteller and observer who reveals the tragic legend of Columbina through puppet performances, unveiling the circus's darkest secrets.
characters.doctorDesc: The plague doctor who conducts dark experiments in the Cyan Tent, measuring fear responses and exploring twisted medical philosophy.
characters.ticketTakerDesc: The reality manipulator who controls the Tent of Mirrors, revealing the true nature of monsters through distorted reflections.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: The Freak Circus is a psychological horror visual novel that explores themes of reality, perception, and the human psyche through the stories of Pierrot and Harlequin. The Day 2 update introduces darker narrative elements including kidnapping, psychological manipulation, and the tragic legend of Columbina that reveals the deep-seated animosity between the two main characters. Players can explore new tent locations, meet mysterious characters like the Jester, Doctor, and Ticket Taker, and discover hidden scenes with multiple endings.
faq.question2: Is the game suitable for all ages?
faq.answer2: No, The Freak Circus contains mature themes, psychological horror, and disturbing imagery. It is recommended for ages 18 and above.
faq.question3: What platforms is the game available on?
faq.answer3: The game is currently available on PC, Mac, and Linux platforms.
faq.answer4: The game offers multiple storylines and endings, with playtime varying based on your choices and exploration.
faq.answer5: The Freak Circus game explores the dark history behind the circus performers' conditions through its narrative, revealing the twisted origins of their unique characteristics as part of the story's mystery elements.
faq.question6: Do fairs, circus and sideshows still have freaks in them?
faq.answer6: While modern circuses have evolved significantly, The Freak Circus draws inspiration from historical sideshow traditions to create its dark, atmospheric setting and explore themes of otherness and acceptance.
faq.question7: How tall is Pierrot in The Freak Circus?
faq.answer7: Pierrot's exact height is part of The Freak Circus game's character design, with his physical presence being carefully crafted to enhance the psychological impact of his character and interactions with the player.
faq.question8: How to get all the endings in The Freak Circus?
faq.answer8: To unlock all endings in The Freak Circus, carefully consider your choices throughout the game. Each decision affects your relationship with Pierrot and Harlequin, leading to different story paths and outcomes.
faq.question9: How to get Pierrot in The Freak Circus to give you cake?
faq.answer9: Building trust with Pierrot in The Freak Circus requires specific choices and interactions. Show genuine interest in his performances and make decisions that align with his preferences to unlock special scenes and interactions.
faq.question10: How to getting a roses off Pierrot of the freaks circus?
faq.answer10: Receiving roses from Pierrot is tied to your relationship progression. Make choices that demonstrate your understanding of his character and show appreciation for his artistic nature to unlock this special interaction.
faq.question11: When will chapter 2 of The Freak Circus come out?
faq.answer11: The development team is actively working on Chapter 2, with new content including extended storylines and character endings planned. Stay updated through official channels for release announcements and development progress.

header.name: Pierrot
header.subtitle: The Silent Obsession - Pierrot from The Freak Circus
header.description: In the shadows of the horror circus, Pierrot captivates your attention in his unique way. His silence hides dangerous obsession, and every glance reveals unspeakable secrets. This artist Pierrot from The Freak Circus has become a beloved character in the visual novel community.

about.title: About Pierrot from The Freak Circus
about.description1: Pierrot from The Freak Circus is one of the most enigmatic and complex characters in the visual novel. This artist Pierrot The Freak Circus is sweet, innocent, and full of love, clearly expressing his emotions even in silence, even when resorting to direct violence when overwhelming emotions burst forth from his lips. The artist Pierrot The Freak Circus has become a beloved figure in the visual novel community.
about.description2: When you helped that poor jester, you never would have thought things would end up like this. Now, you have a tall, clingy Pierrot from The Freak Circus that just so happens to break into your house and watch you sleep at night. His obsession began on a cold winter day when you defended him from an attacker while he was handing out circus flyers, sparking an instant, consuming obsession in this Pierrot from The Freak Circus character.
about.description3: Despite his mysterious clown persona, his pale skin would betray him with a faint blush whenever he saw you. He would whisper to himself about wanting to make you his, to mark you, and keep you entirely for himself. Sometimes, this Pierrot from The Freak Circus would cover you in kisses while you slept, losing count of his gentle affections. For more detailed information, check the Pierrot The Freak Circus wiki for comprehensive character analysis of this Pierrot from The Freak Circus. The Pierrot The Freak Circus wiki provides extensive details about this character's development and story. Stay updated with the latest visual novel updates to discover new developments in Pierrot's story.

traits.title: Pierrot from The Freak Circus Personality Traits

obsessiveLove.title: Obsessive Love
obsessiveLove.description: Pierrot from The Freak Circus experiences an all-consuming obsession that began when you defended him. This artist Pierrot The Freak Circus loves you regardless of how you look, and his devotion runs so deep that he questions why you can't understand that you love him, even if he's a monster. The artist Pierrot The Freak Circus shows unwavering dedication. Learn more about his psychological complexity in our comprehensive wiki.

silentSuffering.title: Silent Suffering
silentSuffering.description: When overwhelming emotions burst forth from his lips, silence follows. He reaches out as if to touch your face, then remembers himself and withdraws. This is the beautiful pain of loving so deeply, like a dagger piercing your chest.

nocturnalVisits.title: Nocturnal Visits
nocturnalVisits.description: Pierrot visits you at night, realizing something that makes him sad and frustrated, needing a hug. He would be gentle if you wanted him to be, and he would do anything for the one who captured his soul.

emotionalTurmoil.title: Emotional Turmoil
emotionalTurmoil.description: His eyes fill with tears, but he holds them back because he cannot leave any traces. He carefully slides off your bed, kneels on the ground, head bowed, unable to leave, yet knowing he must.

abilities.title: Pierrot from The Freak Circus Special Abilities

mesmerizingPerformance.title: Mesmerizing Performance
mesmerizingPerformance.description: Pierrot from The Freak Circus finishes his performance, dancing fluidly with his own shadow to mesmerize the audience, but his focus is solely on you. His golden eyes gleam as he seeks your approval with a sharp and haunting smile. Experience his mesmerizing performance firsthand by downloading The Freak Circus.

emotionalControl.title: Intense Emotional Control
emotionalControl.description: He experiences a strong desire to hold you tighter and see you breathless and sweaty, causing him to flush, but he restrains himself, emphasizing his need for patience. His barely contained excitement is palpable.

devotion.title: Unwavering Devotion
devotion.description: Pierrot continues to hold you, not fully respecting your personal space, yet doing so with a strange kind of reverence, as if he were embracing not just you, but the very core of his existence.

relationships.title: Pierrot from The Freak Circus Character Relationships

protagonist.title: Relationship with Protagonist
protagonist.description: Pierrot from The Freak Circus met you, fell in love with you, and became curious about you. He doesn't care much about your growing closeness with other circus members, but you can't help feeling uneasy. Perhaps Pierrot sensed your unease, or perhaps he's just grown tired of you. Sometimes, Pierrot can make you very angry.

harlequin.title: Dynamic with Harlequin
harlequin.description: Seeing a Pierrot and Harlequin (or his other name, Arlecchino) is very exciting. Their dynamic mimics their historical rivalry, creating tension and drama within The Freak Circus. The relationship between Pierrot and The Freak Circus Harlequin adds layers to the narrative and character interactions. Arlecchino The Freak Circus brings additional complexity to their interactions. The dynamic between Pierrot and The Freak Circus Harlequin is central to the story, while Arlecchino The Freak Circus provides an alternative perspective on their rivalry.

about.description1: Harlequin from The Freak Circus is a central figure known for his enigmatic presence and deeply manipulative nature. The Freak Circus Harlequin thrives on chaos and plays a dangerous game of emotions, often drawing others into his intricate web of deceit and desire. His past is shrouded in mystery, adding to his dangerous allure. The Freak Circus Harlequin has become a fascinating character.
about.description2: This Harlequin from The Freak Circus was originally a difficult person to get along with, until you discovered you both had something in common: a love for all things spicy. Naturally, you both took advantage of this opportunity to have a "friendly" competition in the caf√©, using copious amounts of hot sauce and witty conversation to truly get to know this Harlequin from The Freak Circus better. Discover more about his evolving story through our latest updates.
about.description3: Under the flickering gaslights and shadows of the traveling circus, an entirely new drama is unfolding. Behind the clown troupe's fake smiles and the cheering audience, there lingers old rivalries and dangerous histories. This Harlequin from The Freak Circus is a performer who lives by control and entertainment, but finds that the arrival of a new member has turned his world upside down. For comprehensive details, explore The Freak Circus Harlequin wiki for in-depth character analysis of this Harlequin from The Freak Circus. about.title: About Jester from The Freak Circus
about.description1: The Jester from The Freak Circus Day 2 update is a central figure who acts as both storyteller and observer. Appearing in the Purple/Black Tent during a stage performance, the Jester uses puppets to tell the tragic story that explains the history of the circus and the root of the hatred between Pierrot and Harlequin.
about.description2: The Jester's performance is the most important lore drop in Day 2, revealing the legend of Columbina - the girl known as "The Flower" who was loved by Pierrot ("The Silent Monster") but poisoned by Harlequin ("The Poison") out of jealousy. This act is the root of the eternal conflict between the two main characters, and the Jester implies that history is repeating itself with you, the protagonist, as the new "Columbina."
about.description3: The Jester serves as a narrator of sorts, knowing all the secrets of the circus and serving as an observer who watches the events unfold. His role is crucial in understanding the deeper narrative of The Freak Circus. For more information about the Day 2 update and the Jester's role, check our Day 2 walkthrough guide.

about.title: About Doctor from The Freak Circus
about.description1: The Doctor from The Freak Circus Day 2 update is introduced in the Cyan Tent, appearing as a plague doctor who brings a theme of medical horror to the game. This character adds another layer of psychological terror, conducting examinations that measure fear response and adrenaline levels.
about.description2: The Doctor ties you to a table to measure your fear response, mentioning that "bloodletting" has calming effects - showing his twisted medical philosophy. He values obedience and finds fear fascinating, hinting at his dark experiments. The Doctor suggests that your reactions are different from previous "dolls" or victims, implying you may have a unique role in the circus's twisted games.
about.description3: The Doctor's presence in Day 2 significantly raises the stakes, adding medical horror elements to the psychological thriller. His character represents the darker aspects of the circus, where scientific curiosity meets twisted morality. For more details about the Doctor and the Cyan Tent experience, explore our Day 2 walkthrough guide.

traits.title: Doctor from The Freak Circus Personality Traits

medicalHorror.title: Medical Horror Specialist
medicalHorror.description: The Doctor embodies medical horror, appearing as a plague doctor with twisted medical instruments. His presence adds a chilling layer of scientific terror to The Freak Circus experience. The Doctor operates in the Cyan Tent, one of three new locations introduced in Day 2, alongside the Jester's Purple/Black Tent and the Ticket Taker's Blue Tent.

obsessionWithFear.title: Obsession with Fear
obsessionWithFear.description: The Doctor finds fear fascinating and values the measurement of fear responses and adrenaline levels. His obsession with understanding fear drives his dark experiments, which differ from the psychological manipulation used by Pierrot and Harlequin. Learn more about the Day 2 update in our walkthrough guide.

twistedPhilosophy.title: Twisted Medical Philosophy
twistedPhilosophy.description: The Doctor believes that "bloodletting" has calming effects, demonstrating his twisted approach to medicine. He values obedience and sees fear as something to be studied and manipulated, representing a different kind of horror compared to the emotional obsessions of Pierrot and Harlequin.

experimentalNature.title: Experimental Nature
experimentalNature.description: The Doctor conducts dark experiments, suggesting he has worked with previous "dolls" or victims. His experimental nature makes him a dangerous figure in the circus, operating alongside other Day 2 characters like the Jester and the Ticket Taker. Discover more about the circus's dark experiments in our Wiki.

abilities.title: Doctor from The Freak Circus Special Abilities

fearMeasurement.title: Fear Measurement
fearMeasurement.description: The Doctor has the ability to measure fear responses and adrenaline levels, tying subjects to a table to conduct his examinations. This ability allows him to understand and manipulate fear.

bloodletting.title: Bloodletting Techniques
bloodletting.description: The Doctor practices bloodletting, believing it has calming effects. This twisted medical technique represents his dark approach to healing and control.

psychologicalAnalysis.title: Psychological Analysis
psychologicalAnalysis.description: The Doctor can identify unique reactions in subjects, recognizing that the protagonist's responses differ from previous victims. This ability suggests he may understand the protagonist's special role in the circus, similar to how the Jester recognizes the protagonist as the new Columbina. The Doctor's analysis adds depth to the psychological horror elements introduced in Day 2. Download the game to experience the Doctor's examinations firsthand.

relationships.title: Doctor from The Freak Circus Character Relationships

protagonist.title: Relationship with Protagonist
protagonist.description: The Doctor examines the protagonist in the Cyan Tent, measuring their fear response. He hints that the protagonist's reactions are different from previous "dolls," suggesting they may have a unique role in the circus's twisted games.

circusMembers.title: Role in the Circus
circusMembers.description: The Doctor operates in the Cyan Tent, conducting his dark experiments. His role in the circus represents the scientific and experimental side of the horror, adding depth to the circus's twisted nature. While Pierrot and Harlequin focus on emotional manipulation, the Doctor brings medical horror. He works alongside the Jester (who reveals lore) and the Ticket Taker (who reveals truth through mirrors). Explore all characters in our Wiki or check the latest updates for new content.

gallery.title: Doctor from The Freak Circus Character Gallery

header.name: Ticket Taker
header.subtitle: The Reality Manipulator - Ticket Taker from The Freak Circus
header.description: In the Tent of Mirrors, the Ticket Taker manipulates reality through twisted reflections. This enigmatic character from The Freak Circus Day 2 update reveals the true nature of the monsters around you, warning that nothing is as it seems.

about.title: About Ticket Taker from The Freak Circus
about.description1: The Ticket Taker from The Freak Circus Day 2 update is encountered in the Tent of Mirrors, also known as the Blue Tent. This character manipulates reality through twisted reflections, showing distorted versions of other characters that reveal their true natures.
about.description2: The mirrors in the Tent of Mirrors show disturbing reflections: Pierrot's reflection begs for you to stay with him forever, showing his desperate need for your presence. Harlequin's reflection is aggressive and mocks your weakness, revealing his predatory nature. The Ticket Taker warns you not to trust your eyes - the horrors you see in the mirrors reflect the true nature of the monsters around you.
about.description3: The Ticket Taker's role is crucial as a warning provider, helping players understand the dangers that lie ahead. His ability to reveal truth through distorted reflections makes him an important guide in navigating the twisted world of The Freak Circus. For more information about the Tent of Mirrors and the Ticket Taker, check our Day 2 walkthrough guide.

traits.title: Ticket Taker from The Freak Circus Personality Traits

realityManipulation.title: Reality Manipulation
realityManipulation.description: The Ticket Taker has the ability to manipulate reality through twisted reflections in mirrors. This power allows him to reveal the true nature of characters and situations, showing the hidden aspects of Pierrot and Harlequin. The Tent of Mirrors (Blue Tent) is one of three new locations in Day 2, alongside the Jester's Purple/Black Tent and the Doctor's Cyan Tent.

mirrorMaster.title: Master of Mirrors
mirrorMaster.description: The Ticket Taker controls the Tent of Mirrors, using reflections to show distorted versions of reality. His mastery over mirrors makes him a powerful figure in the circus, complementing the narrative role of the Jester and the experimental nature of the Doctor. Learn more about the Day 2 locations in our walkthrough guide.

warningProvider.title: Warning Provider
warningProvider.description: The Ticket Taker serves as a crucial warning provider, telling players not to trust their eyes. His warnings help players understand the dangers that lie ahead in the circus, including the threats from Pierrot and Harlequin. These warnings are essential for navigating the twisted world of The Freak Circus.

truthRevealer.title: Truth Revealer
truthRevealer.description: Through distorted reflections, the Ticket Taker reveals the true nature of the monsters around you. His reflections show the hidden aspects of characters like Pierrot and Harlequin, providing crucial insights that complement the lore revealed by the Jester. Discover more character insights in our Wiki.

abilities.title: Ticket Taker from The Freak Circus Special Abilities

distortedReflections.title: Distorted Reflections
distortedReflections.description: The Ticket Taker can create distorted reflections in mirrors that reveal the true nature of characters. Pierrot's reflection shows his desperate need, while Harlequin's reflection reveals his predatory nature.

characterRevelation.title: Character Revelation
characterRevelation.description: Through his mirror powers, the Ticket Taker reveals hidden aspects of characters' personalities and motivations. This ability helps players understand the true nature of the circus's inhabitants, including Pierrot, Harlequin, the Jester, and the Doctor. The revelations in the Tent of Mirrors are crucial for understanding the Day 2 narrative. Download the game to experience these revelations yourself.

illusionControl.title: Illusion Control
illusionControl.description: The Ticket Taker controls illusions and reality within the Tent of Mirrors, creating an environment where truth and deception are intertwined. His control over illusions makes the tent a place of revelation and warning.

relationships.title: Ticket Taker from The Freak Circus Character Relationships

protagonist.title: Relationship with Protagonist
protagonist.description: The Ticket Taker serves as a guide and warning provider for the protagonist. Through his mirror reflections, he reveals the true nature of the dangers around them, helping them understand the twisted reality of the circus.

circusCharacters.title: Understanding of Circus Characters
circusCharacters.description: The Ticket Taker understands the true nature of other circus characters, using his mirror powers to reveal their hidden aspects. His reflections of Pierrot and Harlequin show their desperate needs and predatory natures. The Ticket Taker's insights complement the narrative provided by the Jester and the experiments conducted by the Doctor. Together, these Day 2 characters provide a complete picture of the circus's dark secrets. Explore more in our Wiki or read the latest blog posts.

gallery.title: Ticket Taker from The Freak Circus Character Gallery

header.title: The Freak Circus Wiki
header.subtitle: Comprehensive Guide to The Freak Circus Visual Novel

gameOverview.title: Game Overview
gameOverview.description1: The Freak Circus is a dark psychological visual novel that takes players into the twisted world of a traveling circus filled with mystery, obsession, and dangerous relationships. This immersive experience from The Freak Circus combines compelling storytelling with mature themes, creating an unforgettable journey through the shadows of human desire and manipulation.
gameOverview.description2: In The Freak Circus, players assume the role of a caf√© worker whose ordinary life becomes entangled with the enigmatic performers of a sinister circus. The game explores themes of obsession, rivalry, and the darker aspects of human nature through its complex character relationships and branching narrative paths.
gameOverview.description3: The Freak Circus stands out in the visual novel genre for its mature content, psychological depth, and the intricate dynamics between its central characters. This dark tale from The Freak Circus offers multiple endings and character routes, ensuring that each playthrough reveals new layers of the story. Explore the complex relationships between Pierrot and Harlequin, and discover the mysterious new characters from Day 2: Jester, Doctor, and Ticket Taker in this psychological thriller.

gamePremise.title: Game Premise
gamePremise.description1: The story of The Freak Circus begins when the Circus of Horrors arrives in town, bringing with it dark secrets and terrifying mysteries. As a caf√© worker, your ordinary life takes an extraordinary turn when you cross paths with Pierrot, the silent yandere performer whose obsession with you becomes the catalyst for a dangerous game.
gamePremise.description2: However, you're not just caught in Pierrot's web of obsession. Harlequin, his seductive rival, enters the deadly game, creating a complex triangle of desire, manipulation, and psychological tension that forms the core of The Freak Circus experience.
gamePremise.description3: Don't be fooled by their enchanting smiles and captivating performances - in The Freak Circus, nothing is what it seems, and every choice you make could lead to salvation or damnation. This mature visual novel from The Freak Circus features original artwork, compelling characters, and multiple branching storylines that explore the depths of human psychology.

originalArtwork.title: Original Artwork & Characters
originalArtwork.description: The Freak Circus features beautifully crafted original artwork and backgrounds, showcasing compelling characters: Pierrot and Harlequin. The Day 2 update introduces three new characters: Jester, Doctor, and Ticket Taker. Each character in The Freak Circus is meticulously designed to reflect their complex personalities and motivations.

multipleEndings.title: Multiple Endings & Languages
multipleEndings.description: Discover 1 bad ending and 3 open endings with more planned in future updates of The Freak Circus. The game is currently available in English, Portuguese (BR), and Chinese languages, making The Freak Circus accessible to a global audience. Stay informed about new content through our development updates.

matureThemes.title: Dark Mature Themes
matureThemes.description: Experience a mature 18+ story with yandere themes, dark elements, and choice-driven narrative that explores obsession and rivalry. The Freak Circus doesn't shy away from complex psychological themes and mature content warnings.

interactiveStorytelling.title: Interactive Storytelling
interactiveStorytelling.description: The Freak Circus offers an interactive experience where player choices significantly impact the story's direction. Every decision in The Freak Circus can lead to different character interactions and story outcomes.

header.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Mature Content Warning
header.description: The Freak Circus is recommended for ages 18+ and contains the following content:

psychologicalElements.title: Psychological Elements
psychologicalElements.description: Yandere themes, obsession, manipulation, and psychological tension are central to The Freak Circus experience.

darkThemes.title: Dark Themes
darkThemes.description: The Freak Circus includes themes of violence, strong language, and mature situations that may not be suitable for all audiences.

characterDynamics.title: Character Dynamics
characterDynamics.description: Complex relationships involving possessiveness, rivalry, and emotional manipulation are explored throughout The Freak Circus narrative.

developmentStatus.title: Development Status
developmentStatus.description1: The Freak Circus continues to evolve with planned character endings and extended storylines that will deepen your connection to this twisted world. The development team behind The Freak Circus is actively working on new content and improvements. Follow our progress updates for the latest news.
developmentStatus.description2: Future updates for The Freak Circus will include:
developmentStatus.extendedRoutes: Extended character routes for both Pierrot and Harlequin
developmentStatus.additionalEndings: Additional endings and story branches in The Freak Circus
developmentStatus.newLanguageSupport: New language support for The Freak Circus
developmentStatus.improvedMechanics: Improved gameplay mechanics and user interface
developmentStatus.description3: Stay updated through official channels for The Freak Circus release announcements and development progress. The team behind The Freak Circus is committed to delivering a complete and satisfying experience.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.description1: The Freak Circus is available to play online for free, offering a fast and easy gaming experience. You can access The Freak Circus directly through your web browser without the need for downloads or installations. For offline play, you can also download the game to your device.
howToPlay.description2: To get started with The Freak Circus:
howToPlay.step1: Visit the official The Freak Circus website or gaming platform
howToPlay.step2: Click the "Play Now" button to begin your journey in The Freak Circus
howToPlay.step3: Make choices that will determine your relationship with the characters
howToPlay.step4: Explore different paths to discover all the endings in The Freak Circus
howToPlay.description3: You can start playing immediately through our website's Play Now button or visit the official game website to begin your journey in The Freak Circus.
howToPlay.description4: The Freak Circus is designed to be accessible to both newcomers to visual novels and experienced players looking for a mature, psychological experience.

pierrot.name: Pierrot
pierrot.description: The silent yandere performer whose obsession drives the story of The Freak Circus.

harlequin.name: Harlequin
harlequin.description: Pierrot's seductive rival who adds complexity to The Freak Circus narrative.

header.title: The Freak Circus Visual Novel Updates
header.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest development progress of The Freak Circus visual novel

almostThere.title: Almost There!
almostThere.description1: Another monthly update for The Freak Circus visual novel, and we're getting really close to releasing this one!
almostThere.description2: There's about 15-20% of The Freak Circus visual novel dia 2 left to be coded, and that includes finished sprites. After that, the next stage should be a bit "faster" mostly the music and sound effects for The Freak Circus visual novel actualizacion.
almostThere.description3: I've done some beta testing with this update and there are still small parts to fix. The biggest challenge right now is that missing 20% of The Freak Circus visual novel dia 2, since it's packed with transitions and sprites, which makes it pretty complex and time-consuming.
almostThere.description4: Alongside Pierrot and Harlequin, this update will properly introduce you to Ticket Taker, Jester, and the Doctor in The Freak Circus visual novel - you probably remember them from the "Missing" bad end, right?
almostThere.description5: I'm hoping to release The Freak Circus visual novel actualizacion this month along with the store, but in the worst case it'll be pushed to next month. For now, enjoy a few more screenshots from The Freak Circus visual novel development!

monthlyUpdate.title: Monthly Update!
monthlyUpdate.description1: Another month since The Freak Circus visual novel release! So here's more news about the progress on the next update!
monthlyUpdate.description2: Right now, half of The Freak Circus visual novel dia 2 is already coded, though not all of the new sprites are finished yet (and trust me, there are a lot of new sprites and CGs for The Freak Circus visual novel actualizacion).
monthlyUpdate.description3: This update will be a bit longer in terms of gameplay, since now you'll get to know a bit more about the other three characters from The Freak Circus visual novel circus: Jester, Doctor, and Ticket Taker.
monthlyUpdate.description4: On top of that, I'll be adding "hidden scenes" to The Freak Circus visual novel - little story segments you can unlock while playing, and you can access it in the menu. For more details about the game mechanics, check our Wiki page.
monthlyUpdate.description5: I'll also leave a few small secrets for you to spot in The Freak Circus visual novel if you pay attention to your choices!

anniversary.title: 1 Month Anniversary
anniversary.celebration: It's been one month since The Freak Circus visual novel was released! ü•≥
anniversary.thankYou: So I'd like to celebrate with a few updates and a big thank you for supporting The Freak Circus visual novel!
anniversary.dia2Title: About The Freak Circus Visual Novel Dia 2
anniversary.dia2Description: I've been working on The Freak Circus visual novel dia 2 steadily! Some new sprites and backgrounds are already done, and a good portion of The Freak Circus visual novel dia 2 has already been coded.
anniversary.summaryTitle: Here's a quick summary of The Freak Circus Visual Novel Actualizacion:
anniversary.summary1: The story will continue from all three endings: the two where you're taken by Pierrot, and the one where you return home.
anniversary.summary2: You'll get to meet three new characters in The Freak Circus visual novel dia 2, each in their own tent: Jester, Doctor, and Ticket Taker!
anniversary.summary3: There will be more scenes with Pierrot and Harlequin while you get to know the new characters.
anniversary.summary4: Some sprites will be animated in The Freak Circus visual novel actualizacion!
anniversary.summary5: The game menu will also get a brand-new look for The Freak Circus visual novel!
anniversary.summary6: And along with the current platforms, an Android version of The Freak Circus visual novel will be released when the update is ready!

futureUpdates.title: Future Updates
futureUpdates.description1: Heyo! I'd like to share a few things about future updates for The Freak Circus visual novel!
futureUpdates.description2: The script for The Freak Circus visual novel dia 2 is already partially complete, and I plan to revise it and start making the new backgrounds and character sprites. The Freak Circus visual novel actualizacion will include significant content expansions.
futureUpdates.description3: I'll be posting monthly updates about The Freak Circus visual novel progress. I'll also be doing weekly small updates on social media, showing some extra content from The Freak Circus visual novel development.
futureUpdates.description4: I'll be posting more detailed updates, behind-the-scenes content, and first reveals about The Freak Circus visual novel on the support pages. For comprehensive information, visit our Wiki.
futureUpdates.description5: I work during the day, so I use my free time to develop The Freak Circus visual novel. If I get more supporters, I'll be able to reduce my workload and dedicate more time to this. But don't worry, progress will keep moving forward either way!
futureUpdates.description6: Once again, thank you so much to everyone who bought The Freak Circus visual novel to show your support! You can download the game to experience the latest updates.
futureUpdates.description7: I'll be posting more detailed updates, behind-the-scenes content, and first reveals about The Freak Circus visual novel on the support pages. For comprehensive information, visit our Wiki.

chineseLanguage.title: Chinese Language Now Available
chineseLanguage.description1: The Freak Circus visual novel now includes a Chinese translation! Kindly made by: copiklaGrogu Thank you so much for the support and for putting in the care to bring The Freak Circus visual novel to even more people!
chineseLanguage.description2: It truly means a lot to see so many players enjoying The Freak Circus visual novel story and wanting to feel a little closer to the characters like this! You can access the game preferences and select your preferred language there!
chineseLanguage.description3: This expansion of The Freak Circus visual novel actualizacion brings the game to a wider international audience, making the story accessible to Chinese-speaking players who want to experience the unique world of Pierrot and Harlequin.

pronounOptions.title: Pronoun Options Update
pronounOptions.description1: I made a small update that allows you to choose your pronouns in The Freak Circus visual novel, so the way characters refer to you can now be customized! This enhancement makes The Freak Circus visual novel more inclusive and personalized for all players.
pronounOptions.description2: This version of The Freak Circus visual novel only adds the pronoun selection feature, along with a line of dialogue to keep the story continuity intact. For more details about character interactions, check out our Wiki page.
pronounOptions.description3: I had to make some modifications to the dialogues in The Freak Circus visual novel to keep everything neutral in certain situations. Nothing that changes the story, of course, they were just adaptations. The Freak Circus visual novel actualizacion includes these improvements to ensure better player experience.

thankYou.title: Thank you!
thankYou.gratitudeTitle: Thank you so much for all the support and kindness!
thankYou.description1: Huge thanks to everyone who bought The Freak Circus visual novel to support my idea, it truly moves me to see that you liked it enough to support me like this! The Freak Circus visual novel has received incredible feedback from the community.
thankYou.description2: Thank you as well for all the comments and reviews!
thankYou.description3: I've already made a few decisions to improve certain aspects of The Freak Circus visual novel, like adding pronoun options for the protagonist and a few other things, and I'll be working on the continuation with lots of care and love!
thankYou.description4: I don't like leaving plot holes, so I treat the script with great care. Once I have a more solid foundation for The Freak Circus visual novel dia 2, I'll post an update here and on social media, and start getting the support pages active again so the project can move forward faster!
thankYou.description5: The stage is being set, make yourselves comfortable. But if I were you... I wouldn't trust the food.

WeeklyUpdate1.title: Weekly Update
WeeklyUpdate1.description1: I got a bunch of feedback on the beta version and I still haven't managed to fix all the little details. Honestly, I hadn't even noticed so many mistakes myself, haha.
WeeklyUpdate1.description2: Meanwhile, I also spotted a small issue in the script with a very specific route, so I had to pause and rewrite some scenes so they would fit both paths. Luckily, I caught it before moving forward.
WeeklyUpdate1.description3: Once that particular scene is ready, I'll finally start working on the tent scene for one of the characters, and man‚Ä¶ that's going to be a lot of work‚Ä¶
WeeklyUpdate1.description4: Also, the theme for the next comic strip will be Pierrot's old outfits! Voted by the patrons! I'll work on it in my free time, so it might take a little while to come out.

WeeklyUpdate2.title: Weekly Update
WeeklyUpdate2.description1: I'm working on one of the three characters! And I'm really excited (maybe hyperfocused on it). Once I finish presenting all three, The Freak Circus visual novel will move into its final stage! It's still going to take some time, especially with Jester's part. His tent will be challenging to program I keep coming up with a lot of visual ideas to create the right atmosphere for the scene. What does that mean? That even for a scene that lasts only a few seconds, I'll insist on showing several sprites if necessary to capture the right feeling. Well, I did manage to pull some reactions out of you with that!
WeeklyUpdate2.description2: Some of the previous errors were fixed, and a few sprites also needed adjustments to fit better into certain scenes. The game's menu font has some issues with translations, so that's still a problem I need to solve. Worst case scenario, I'll have to replace it but I still have a few alternatives to try before resorting to that.
WeeklyUpdate2.description3: One more thing! Don't worry guys, I'm not in the game! The name "Neko" in the screenshots is just to test the MC's lines!
WeeklyUpdate2.description4: It's easier for me to pay attention if the code calling the player's name works when I test it with my own name haha!

WeeklyUpdate3.title: Weekly Update
WeeklyUpdate3.description1: Sorry for being a bit absent on social media, folks I've been really focused on finishing the part I started coding. When things don't work out, I get obsessed with fixing them until they finally run haha! I'm still at it‚Ä¶  I can already say it won't be ready this month. My new expectation is around the middle of next month BUT that's not a guarantee. (Please be patient with me ;u;)
WeeklyUpdate3.description2: Now for the progress update! Almost half of one of the tents is already coded, though I don't have many sprites ready for this scene yet. Creating new sprites always takes a bit longer, and it's the part I test the most it's been a lot of work, and honestly I find drawing more tiring.
WeeklyUpdate3.description3: Doctor has already had his look adjusted twice during testing, Jester only once, and possibly each of them (Jester, Doctor, and Ticket Taker) will get a little animation. For more details about these new characters, check our Wiki page.
WeeklyUpdate3.description4: I think I can already say there's only about 13% left to go before finishing both the coding and the art.

WeeklyUpdate4.title: Weekly Update
WeeklyUpdate4.description1: I managed to finish coding the cyan tent, only 2 sprites left to complete that scene.(And once again I had to fix the Doctor's sprite‚Ä¶ I really hope that doesn't happen with Jester.) And there are also code details and transitions that have not yet been fixed.
WeeklyUpdate4.description2: Now there are only the blue and purple tents left for the update's coding to be done.
WeeklyUpdate4.description3: The cyan tent made my code break so many times, it was exhausting. And since the other two tents are even more complex, I know it'll happen again. So just to reinforce: once I finish coding all the dialogues for The Freak Circus visual novel, then I'll be able to start talking about dates!

monthlyUpdateSoClose.title: Monthly update! So close!!
monthlyUpdateSoClose.description1: Monthly update! I was hoping to release the game before this monthly devlog, but as you can imagine, a lot of things came up plenty of code issues I keep having to revise and fix.
monthlyUpdateSoClose.description2: I can't give you an exact release date, though I would love to launch the update this month, especially since it's the month of horror! But I can't promise that‚Ä¶ even if, as you probably know, it's very close to being done.
monthlyUpdateSoClose.description3: Only the final act still needs to be coded after that, things will move much faster! So far in this update, there are already over 100 new images, including new sprites and backgrounds, just to give you an idea.
monthlyUpdateSoClose.description4: Here's a quick roadmap so you can get a sense of what's left. Once I finish coding the remaining 5%, the next steps are:
monthlyUpdateSoClose.roadmap1: Finishing the sprites for that last 5%
monthlyUpdateSoClose.roadmap2: Adding the new sound effects and music
monthlyUpdateSoClose.roadmap3: Full revision and testing of the update
monthlyUpdateSoClose.roadmap4: Build tests for browser and Android
monthlyUpdateSoClose.roadmap5: And then that's it the update will be ready to launch!
monthlyUpdateSoClose.description5: I'm trying to run more tests this time so there won't be as many errors, since the last release had quite a few that I had to fix later.

lastDevlog.title: Last devlog before the update (I Hope!)
lastDevlog.description1: I bring good news! This will be the last devlog before the update. Which means the next notification you get will be the update release!
lastDevlog.description2: It's planned to come out this month. I don't have an exact date yet, but I'll spend the next few days doing final tests and fixes! As soon as I have a confirmed date, I'll post it on my social media. Everything is already coded and currently being tested so I can finally release this update!
lastDevlog.description3: Some choices in the game are still causing small issues in certain routes, so that's basically what I'm fixing right now. It's a bit of work because of the number of choices and situations in this update, but as long as nothing crashes, it should be released before the end of the month.
lastDevlog.description4: Thank you all for your patience and support! The update is almost here!

newCharacters.title: Meet the Three New Characters: Jester, Doctor, and Ticket Taker
newCharacters.description1: We're thrilled to introduce three enigmatic new characters that join Pierrot and Harlequin in The Freak Circus! Each character brings their own unique darkness and mystery to the circus, expanding the story's depth and complexity.
newCharacters.description2: The Jester is the storyteller and observer of the circus. Through mesmerizing puppet performances, he reveals the tragic legend of Columbina - the story that lies at the heart of the animosity between Pierrot and Harlequin. The Jester's tent becomes a place where truth and fiction blur, where ancient secrets are unveiled through the art of storytelling.
newCharacters.description3: The Doctor is a plague doctor who conducts unsettling experiments in the Cyan Tent. With his chilling demeanor and twisted medical philosophy, he explores the depths of fear and obedience. The Doctor's presence adds a layer of medical horror to the game, as he measures fear responses and pushes the boundaries of what it means to "heal".
newCharacters.description4: The Ticket Taker guards the entrance to the Tent of Mirrors, a place where reality becomes distorted and reflections reveal the true, monstrous nature of those within the circus. He manipulates reflections to show you what others cannot see, warning you about the true nature of the circus monsters through twisted mirrors.
newCharacters.description5: Each of these characters has their own dedicated character page where you can learn more about their backgrounds, personality traits, abilities, and relationships with other characters. Explore their stories and discover how they fit into the larger narrative of The Freak Circus.
newCharacters.description6: These three new characters are now fully integrated into the game's Day 2 update, bringing new locations, interactions, and story paths for players to explore. Visit their character pages to dive deeper into their mysterious worlds!

day2Update.title: Day 2 Update: New Characters and Darker Story
day2Update.description1: The Day 2 update has finally arrived! This major update significantly raises the stakes of the game, plunging players into a darker narrative involving kidnapping, psychological manipulation, and the tragic legend of Columbina that reveals the deep-seated animosity between Pierrot and Harlequin.
day2Update.description2: Day 2 begins with you waking up chained to a bed in an unfamiliar room inside the circus tent. Pierrot claims he drugged and kidnapped you to "protect" you from the others, showing his possessive and unstable nature. Meanwhile, Harlequin invades the room while Pierrot is away, highlighting the contrast between the two characters - while Pierrot wants to hide you away, Harlequin wants to "play" and hunt.
day2Update.description3: The update introduces three new mysterious characters: the Jester, who tells the tragic story of Columbina using puppets; the Doctor, a plague doctor who brings medical horror to the game; and the Ticket Taker, who manipulates reality through twisted reflections in the Tent of Mirrors.
day2Update.description4: Players can now explore specific attraction tents, each revealing different aspects of the circus's dark secrets. The Day 2 update also features a new Hidden Scenes System that adds depth and replayability, multiple endings based on your choices, and over 100 new images including character sprites, expressions, and backgrounds.
day2Update.description5: For a complete walkthrough and detailed guide to all the new content, check out our comprehensive Day 2 blog post which covers all the key events, new locations, character interactions, hidden scenes, and multiple endings you'll encounter during the second day of your journey through the circus.

header.title: The Freak Circus Pierrot Para Coloriar Kawaii
header.subtitle: Free coloring pages featuring cute kawaii Pierrot designs from The Freak Circus visual novel

about.title: About Pierrot Coloring Pages
about.description1: Welcome to our collection of The Freak Circus Pierrot para coloriar designs! These adorable kawaii coloring pages feature everyone's favorite melancholic clown from The Freak Circus visual novel.
about.description2: Each coloring page is carefully designed to capture Pierrot's unique personality - from his signature jester outfit to his expressive emotions. Whether you're a fan of the Pierrot character or simply love kawaii art, these pages are perfect for relaxation and creativity.
about.description3: All coloring pages are free to download and print. They're perfect for fans of The Freak Circus who want to bring their favorite character to life with colors. For more information about the game, check our Wiki page or download the visual novel.

items.question: How do I download the coloring pages?
items.answer: Simply click on any image or the download button to save the high-resolution coloring page to your device. All files are in WebP format for optimal quality.

items.question: What file format are the coloring pages?
items.answer: All coloring pages are provided in high-quality WebP format for optimal file size and image quality. You can easily convert them to PDF or print them directly.

items.question: Can I use these coloring pages for commercial purposes?
items.answer: These coloring pages are for personal use only. For commercial use, please contact us for licensing information. We appreciate your respect for our intellectual property.

items.question: Are there more Pierrot coloring pages coming?
items.answer: Yes! We regularly add new Pierrot coloring designs based on fan feedback and new content from The Freak Circus visual novel. Check back often for updates!

items.question: What makes these Pierrot designs kawaii?
items.answer: Our kawaii Pierrot designs feature cute, simplified versions of the character with big eyes, soft expressions, and adorable poses that make him more approachable while maintaining his unique jester aesthetic from The Freak Circus.

items.question: Do I need to know about The Freak Circus to enjoy these coloring pages?
items.answer: Not at all! While these designs are inspired by The Freak Circus visual novel, they're designed to be enjoyed by anyone who loves kawaii art and coloring. However, if you're curious about the character, check out our Pierrot character page!

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small files stored on your device that help websites remember preferences and improve user experience. Web beacons are small, typically transparent images used to monitor user behavior.
